details.title: Core Systems Engineer
details.description: Senior member of the core team responsible for developing high-performance applications for critical systems and services, including fund management, wallet services, promotions, ranking, and loyalty. Acted as a key technical liaison between engineering and product teams, driving the translation of business goals into scalable solutions. Ensured high availability and efficiency while contributing to the full development lifecycle by crafting well-designed, testable code and supporting software releases.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s, AWS

details.title: Ranking Service for Game Leaderboards
details.description: Redesigned and developed the ranking leaderboard service to be stateless, ensuring scalability and high concurrency for platform-level online gaming systems. Leveraged Redis Sorted Sets and Kafka to handle concurrent gameplay events across 1,000+ leaderboards, serving over 1 million active users.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s

details.title: Loyalty Service Redesign and Development
details.description: Redesigned and developed the loyalty service to introduce a reward points currency and integrate with other services for enabling purchases using reward points. Extensively used Redis to support low-latency and highly available operations for concurrent user transactions, making the service extremely scalable.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s

details.title: Loyalty Service Integration with Promotions Service
details.description: Led the project to integrate two existing business platforms to meet a critical business requirement. Used Kafka to achieve sub-150ms latency in inter-service communication during peak usage by 100K+ concurrent users across both services.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s

details.title: Game Cluster Migration
details.description: Led the architectural segregation of all games on the platform into distinct profiles to ensure cluster reusability. Overhauled the promotion serviceâ€™s game-handling logic to align with the new game cluster architecture.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s

details.title: Promotions and Loyalty Configurations
details.description: Led the complete overhaul of legacy vanilla JavaScript-based frontend applications used to configure 50+ parameters for Promotions and Loyalty settings. Rebuilt the system using an in-house React-based UI library, improving usability, maintainability, and performance.

details.title: Technical Optimizations
details.description: Implemented multiple features and optimizations, utilizing Redis for caching and Kafka for decoupled messaging. Optimized network calls and database operations, reducing latency from 2000ms to 70ms. Modernized legacy systems by migrating from Spring to Spring Boot with Java 21.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Microservices, Docker, K8s

details.title: Software Architect
details.description: Served as the technical lead and software architect for multiple digital transformation initiatives at Vijayawada Municipal Corporation. Responsible for defining system architecture, choosing technology stacks, and overseeing end-to-end implementation of web-based enterprise applications. Collaborated closely with department heads to translate operational requirements into scalable software solutions. Standardized development workflows, introduced CI/CD practices, and improved deployment efficiency using Docker and AWS. Mentored junior developers and ensured long-term maintainability of delivered systems.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Docker, AWS

details.title: Protrack: Employee management system
details.description: Responsible for design, development, testing, and maintenance of a full stack feature-rich, multi-stage application for Vijayawada Municipal Corporation(VMC) to track the progress of their various works and projects which helps in monitoring the performance of the employees (used by more than 100 different employed people of VMC). Led training, supervision, and project handover to a team of two recent graduates.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Docker, AWS

details.title: Apptrack: Online file/tender tracking system
details.description: Designed and developed a complete file tracking system for efficient management of official documents within the corporation, reducing manual workload, identifying processing bottlenecks, and maintaining a comprehensive document flow history for organization employees. Implemented features like document auto signing, document storage, and document processing queues using AWS infrastructure like S3 storage, SQS, etc.
details.languages: Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Docker, AWS

details.title: Automated system for Image operations
details.description: Spearheaded the design, development, and maintenance of an automated system for creating, scheduling, and executing tasks related to image ranking and generating image overlays on the cloud. Reduced manual workload for the team by 80 percent..

details.title: Data Ingestion and Database Population
details.description: Designed and implemented a robust REST endpoint for efficient CSV data ingestion, aggregation, and database population from internal analytics teams. Collected their data configurations, created models, and established seamless data population and querying processes.

details.title: Business Insights Portals
details.description: Developed multiple REST endpoints tailored to serve data to revenue team dashboards and homeowner insights portal. Collected data configuration requirements from stakeholders in JSON format and seamlessly integrated them with various analytics databases such as Google Big Data, PostgreSQL, and Presto. Ensured smooth data flow, interoperability, and accessibility for stakeholders.
